Body.Content:
If you’re an IT professional or decision maker, start using the newest Windows 11 capabilities with helpful tips and actionable steps summarized in one place. Read this month’s recap of improvements in Windows client and server security, device and update management, Microsoft Copilot, productivity, and collaboration. Get started with the unified Windows Autopatch solution, new update compliance alerts in Microsoft Intune and Windows Update for Business reports, security improvements for Copilot+ PCs and Windows Server, new app solutions, among others. Additionally, try preview opportunities for Azure Arc-connected hotpatching for Windows Server 2025 and other improvements released in September. 
 
When will this happen: 
All improvements summarized in this monthly recap are already available. 
 
How this will affect your organization: 
Whatever tools you use, you can start seeing improvements across various workflows in your organization with: 
  • A unified Windows Autopatch solution, incorporating Windows Update for Business deployment service 
  • New alerts to improve Windows update compliance reporting in Microsoft Intune and Windows Update for Business reports 
  • Copilot+ PC silicon and Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection 
  • Azure Arc-connected hotpatching for Windows Server 2025 preview 
  • The Windows app and other app solutions through Microsoft Intune 
  • Other improvements released in September 
 
What you need to do to prepare: 
Read the new monthly recap and additional information to start benefiting from the latest improvements. 
 
Additional information: 
Read the monthly recap at Windows news you can use: September 2024. It includes highlights from the following channels: 
  • Windows IT Pro Blog
  • Windows Server Community
  • Microsoft Intune Blog
  • Windows Insider Blog 
  • Windows Experience Blog
  • Microsoft Copilot documentation
  • Windows 11, version 23H2 update history

Title: Get started with September 2024 improvements in Windows 11
